channel.title: Error connecting to server
channel.description:
Yes I'm portforwarded. I even used the port checker and it said both ports are open.
Now when I change my ip on the client what do I put it to? My no-ip address? Or 0.0.0.0 I'm pretty sure I put it my no-ip but when I do that it doesn't let me connect. Also do I have to change anything on the server or do I just change ip on the client please help me.
Thanks

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @GnarlyUnicorn GnarlyUnicorn
item.description:
@GnarlyUnicorn wrote:

Yes I’m portforwarded. I even used the port checker and it said both ports are open.

Now when I change my ip on the client what do I put it to? My no-ip address? Or 0.0.0.0 I’m pretty sure I put it my no-ip but when I do that it doesn’t let me connect. Also do I have to change anything on the server or do I just change ip on the client please help me.

Thanks
